participant_1.name: Blake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, always looking for new experiences.
participant_1.background: i am a country music singer. my favorite band is rascal flats. we spent summers ring at national parks. i started playing guitar when i was three. i grew up in the industry.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and grounded, with a strong connection to nature.
participant_2.background: i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. i am a huge coffee lover. i don't drink alcohol. my father was a construction worker.
